org.wikidata.wdtk.datamodel.json

Class JsonSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wikidata.wdtk.datamodel.json.JsonSerializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntityDocumentProcessor, EntityDocumentsSerializer

    public class JsonSerializer
extends Object
implements EntityDocumentsSerializer
    This class implements EntityDocumentsSerializer to provide a JsonSerializer for EntityDocument objects.
    Author:
    Michael GÃ¼nther

      JsonSerializer(OutputStream out)
      Creates a new JSON serializer that writes its output to the given stream.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

    • Method Detail

      • restartProcess

        public void restartProcess()
        This function resets the processor. Json is not a flat format. So it is necessary to inform the processor if a new serialisation was initiated.

      • finishProcessingEntityDocuments

        public void finishProcessingEntityDocuments()
        Description copied from interface: EntityDocumentProcessor
        Performs final actions that should be done after all entity documents in a batch of entity documents have been processed. For example, this might be called after a whole dumpfile was completely processed.
        Specified by:
        finishProcessingEntityDocuments in interface EntityDocumentProcessor
